channel.title: Mobile on Mattermost Developers
channel.description: Recent content in Mobile on Mattermost Developers

item.title: Environment Setup
item.description: Envrionment Setup The following instructions apply to the mobile apps for iOS and Android built in React Native. Download the iOS version here and the Android version here. Source code can be found at: https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-mobile If you run into any issues getting your environment set up, check the Troubleshooting section at the bottom for common solutions. Development Environment Setup Mac OS X Install XCode 8.3. Install Homebrew. Using Homebrew, install Node.
